title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 146-2.15 - Tip sharing
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 146-2.15 - Tip sharing

State Regulations
(a) Directly tipped employees may share their tips on a voluntary basis with other
service employees or food service workers who participated in providing service
to customers. (b) An employer may
require directly tipped food service workers to share their tips with other
food service workers who participated in providing service to customers and may
set the percentage to be given to each occupation. However, employees must
handle the transactions themselves. (c) Nothing in this section shall be
interpreted as requiring an employer to compensate participants in tip sharing
for tips wrongfully withheld from the tip sharing by any participant. Notes
